column6: two suspects were detained by police on patrol about 500 meters from the village ------of Tuol Prey Pong
column8: Svay Rieng Province.------The police patrolling the area at night found the two suspects hastily carving up a brown cow in the darkness
column9: and were detained immediately for questioning.------The suspects; Nhim Jenna
column12: a 25-year-old man both confessed to stealing the cow before beginning to butcher the beast.------Both suspects were charged by the police and will soon be up before the court.------ ------http://www.arey-news.com/archives/314055
